New features & updates:
- Support cold wallet and watch wallet on Solana.
- Strengthen the approval reminder.
- Announcement center upgrade.
- Optimize the token search function.
- Support to add a custom network in disconnected network.
- Optimize the stability of WalletConnect.
- EVM chain transaction panel displays data details.
- EVM chain wallet support the approval management.
- Bug fixes & experience improvements.
